rules_text:
If you would create one or more tokens, those tokens plus an additional Estus token are created instead. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Sacrifice three Estus: Draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]A sacred rite passed down among clerics, but all Undead can imitate the process.[/i]
